name: Four Temperaments
description: Identify which classic temperaments best align with your character, using this personality theory developed by Hippocrates in ancient Greece

attributes.name: Sanguine
attributes.description: The degree to which they have an outgoing, cheerful, and optimistic personality. How is this represented?

attributes.name: Choleric
attributes.description: The degree to which they have a results-oriented, independent, decisive personality. How is this represented?

attributes.name: Melancholic
attributes.description: The degree to which they have a loyal, kind, and sensitive personality. How is this represented?

attributes.name: Phlegmatic
attributes.description: The degree to which they have a service-oriented, introverted, and passive/agreeable personality. How is this represented?
